Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Arizona in 2013...
Injured on 5/27/2014 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 8/4/2016...
Traded from Arizona to Los Angeles (A) on 1/31/2017 (Going to ARI: 1B M. Teixeira, P G. Floyd. Going to LAA: P C. Ruiz)...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Oakland on 6/17/2017, striking out 3...
Had first career hit on 7/14/2018, off Paul Clemens (PIT)...
Injured on 9/5/2019 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2020, going 4-0, 0.64...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/8/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
